title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Skills: Blended Instruction for Delegation and Supervision Competencies in Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can explain appropriate delegation criteria for HCAs (Healthcare Assistants) with over 90% accuracy.
Participants successfully perform five types of task supervision scenarios, including conflict situations, in a VR simulation environment.
Through project-based assessment, learners can analyze real clinical cases and propose improvements to delegation processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
